blogPost.excerpt: The biggest update yet, Diagrams 2.0 Macaw, brings full optimization for macOS Big Sur and the new M1 Macs, along with many new features like palette presets, customizable palettes, and new styling options.
blogPost.body: The biggest update yet, Diagrams 2.0 Macaw, brings full optimization for macOS Big Sur and the new M1 Macs, along with many new features like palette presets, customizable palettes, and new styling options.
blogPost.title: Diagrams 2.0 - A major update to your diagramming experience on Mac
blogPost.author: Lukas Kubanek

localize.description: 迄今为止最大的更新--Diagrams 2.0 Macaw，带来了针对macOS Big Sur和新M1 Mac的全面优化，以及许多新功能，如调色板预设、可自定义调色板和新的造型选项。
localize.tagline: Mac上的图表绘制体验的重大更新。

localize.description: 迄今爲止最大的更新--Diagrams 2.0 Macaw，帶來了針對macOS Big Sur和新M1 Mac的全面優化，以及許多新功能，如調色板預設、可自定義調色板和新的造型選項。
localize.tagline: Mac上的圖表繪製體驗的重大更新。
